title: The Oberoi Group launches Oberoi Group Scholarship Program
description: Celebrating its 90th anniversary, The Oberoi Group unveiled The Oberoi Group Scholarship Program. The scholarships, the ‘Dare to Dream’ and ‘Be the Best,’ aim to nurture hospitality leaders. Recipients will pursue an MBA in Hospitality at Ecole Hôtelière de Lausanne, combining virtual lessons with immersive experiences. This initiative honours the group's founders’ legacy.
